easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the number of vengeance points in the victory display.
easyStandard.cultist: -X. X is the number of locations in play (max 5).
easyStandard.tablet: -X. X is the number of cards in the exploration deck (max 5).
easyStandard.elderThing: -2. If you are poisoned, this test automatically fails instead.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is 1 higher than the number of vengeance points in the victory display.
hardExpert.cultist: -X. X is the number of locations in play.
hardExpert.tablet: -X. X is the number of cards in the exploration deck (min 3).
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you are poisoned, this test automatically fails instead. If you are not poisoned and you fail, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area.
